title: Officials Try to Salvage Negotiations for a Cease-Fire in Gaza
content: Biden said that talks in Cairo could “remove any remaining obstacles,” but Israel and Hamas are skeptical.
summary: Biden said that talks in Cairo could “remove any remaining obstacles,” but Israel and Hamas are skeptical.

title: The War in Gaza Is Making Thousands of Orphans
content: Extended families, hospital staff and volunteers are stepping in to care for Gaza’s many newly orphaned children, some of whom are injured, traumatized and haunted by memories of their parents.
summary: Extended families, hospital staff and volunteers are stepping in to care for Gaza’s many newly orphaned children, some of whom are injured, traumatized and haunted by memories of their parents.

title: After Kolkata Rape Case, India Asks Why It Can’t Protect Women

summary: The rape and murder of a trainee doctor at her own hospital has brought up, once again, uncomfortable truths about a country that wants to be a global leader.

title: Lynch Yacht Sinking Off Sicily Proves as Baffling as It Is Tragic

title: Sugar Industry Faces Pressure Over Coerced Hysterectomies in India
content: After an investigation that ran in The New York Times, the industry is edging toward change. But companies in western India are reluctant to abandon an abusive labor system.
summary: After an investigation that ran in The New York Times, the industry is edging toward change. But companies in western India are reluctant to abandon an abusive labor system.

title: What’s in the Latest U.S. Proposal for a Gaza Cease-Fire?
